channel.title: Spawning Items
channel.description: :confused:...can sum1 help me out a bit here...i just began this game because my friend has just showed it to me...he has told me there is a way to just spawn items right in front of you...but neither of us can figure out how...can sum help us out a bit plz :(

item.title: Spawning Items
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

well on your server the first thing you might wanna do is type ::help and see if the code for your particular server is posted, otherwise tell me what server you’re using (p16,hybrid,etc.) and i can probably help you. please do know that some servers have turned off item spawning.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Items
item.dc:creator: @Syn Syn
item.description:
@Syn wrote:

Easy peesy, easiest thing actually, you can either type ::item [item id #] or ::pickup [item id #] [amount]

If you need codes, go here
Edit: http://dodian.com/index.php?page=items

Read full topic
